title: Mathematics Classroom Learning Behavior Self-Assessment Tool Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: PBL course conducted in a flexible schedule for working learners and a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can self-assess their learning behaviors in the mathematics classroom using three or more standardized scales.
Learners can design two or more personalized learning strategies based on their self-assessment results.
Learners can validate the validity of tools developed through peer feedback and expert review.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
